Package processing

Class ComputeTour

java.lang.Object
processing.ComputeTour
public class ComputeTour
extends java.lang.Object
Class that groups the tour computation algorithms. Use planTour() to get a Tour.
See Also:
ComputeTourCommand

      public ComputeTour()

  • Method Details

    • planTour

      public static Tournee planTour​(Map map, PlanningRequest planning, Heuristique heuristique)
      Main function of ComputeTour, computes a Tour according to the informations of the map and requests list XML files, as well as a choice of heuristic.
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      heuristique - The heuristic to use (influences the quality of the result and execution speed)
      Returns:
      the computed Tour

    • recreateTourneeWithOrder

      public static Tournee recreateTourneeWithOrder​(Map map, PlanningRequest planning, java.util.ArrayList<Controller.LocationTagContent> order)
      Computes the Tour passing through all pickup and delivery points in a specific order.
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      order - The points through which the Tour has to pass, in chronological order
      Returns:
      the computed Tour

    • dijkstra

      private static java.util.ArrayList<Segment> dijkstra​(Map map, Intersection depart, java.util.LinkedList<Intersection> ptsInteret, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> intersecIdToIndex)
      Dijkstra on the given map from a departure point to all interest points.
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search
      depart - The starting point of the search
      ptsInteret - List of the interest points : points to which we want to know the shortest path from the starting point
      Returns:
      the predecessor list of each node according to the shortest path towards all interest points and nodes on the path to interest nodes. The function stops when the shortest paths to all interest points are computed.

    • getOptimalFullGraph

      private static SuperArete[][] getOptimalFullGraph​(Map map, PlanningRequest planning, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> intersecIdToIndex)
      Computes the full graph in which all nodes are pickup, delivery points or the departure address (interest points), and vertices are the shortest paths on the Map between those interest points.
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      intersecIdToIndex - The dictionnary giving the index of an Intersection in the Intersection list of the map, from its ID
      Returns:
      the full graph as an adjacence matrix. Accessing it at indices [departure][destination] gives the SuperArete object in which the path attibute is the shortest path (as list of map Segments) from the departure node to the destination node.

    • getListeAdj

      private static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Segment>> getListeAdj​(Map map, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> intersecIdToIndex)
      Computes the adjacence list corresponding to the graph built from the Segments and Intersections of the Map given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search
      intersecIdToIndex - The dictionnary giving the index of an Intersection in the Intersection list of the map, from its ID
      Returns:
      the adjacence list, indexed according to the indices given by the HashMap given as parameter, and including for each Intersection the list of Segments having for origin this Intersection.

    • indexationIntersections

      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> indexationIntersections​(Map map)
      Creates a dictionnary giving the index of an Intersection in the Intersection list of the Map, according to its ID.
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search
      Returns:
      the dictionnary

    • recreateChemin

      private static java.util.ArrayList<Segment> recreateChemin​(java.util.ArrayList<Segment> predList, Intersection depart, Intersection arrivee, java.util.ArrayList<Intersection> intersections, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> intersecIdToIndex)
      Recreates a path (as a Segments list) from a predecessor list, a departure node and a destination node.
      Parameters:
      predList - The predecessor vertices list : at each index, the Segment leading to this node from the previous node
      depart - The Intersection at the departure of the path
      arrivee - The Intersection at the destination of the path
      intersections - The Intersection list of the map
      intersecIdToIndex - The dictionnary giving the index of an Intersection in the Intersection list of the map, from its ID
      Returns:
      the path from the departure node to the destination node

    • recreateTimesTournee

      public static void recreateTimesTournee​(Tournee tournee, PlanningRequest planning)
      Computes the arrival times of each pickup/delivery, as well as the associated path fragments. Used when it would be more complicated to compute this during the main Tour calculations.
      Parameters:
      tournee - The Tour to modify (no return, modifies the parameter directly)
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address

    • pickRandom

      private static <T> T pickRandom​(java.util.ArrayList<T> arrayList)
      Chooses a random element in any ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      arrayList - The list in which the element is chosen
      Returns:
      the chosen element

    • indexerPtsInteret

      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> indexerPtsInteret​(PlanningRequest planning)
      Indexes the pickup and delivery of each request as well as the departure address in the following way : - index 0 : departure address - index 1 and above : each interest point other than the departure address, indexed according to ptsIdToIndex
      Parameters:
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      Returns:
      the dictionnary associating the intersection ID to its index

    • cheminVersTournee

      private static Tournee cheminVersTournee​(PlanningRequest planningRequest, java.util.ArrayList<SuperArete> chemin)
      Rebuilds a Tour object from a full path and the given Requests.
      Parameters:
      chemin - The path to use for the Tour
      Returns:
      the computed Tour

    • cheminAleatoire

      private static java.util.ArrayList<SuperArete> cheminAleatoire​(SuperArete[][] matAdj, PlanningRequest planning, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> ptsIdToIndex)
      CrÃ©e un chemin alÃ©atoire valide, c'est-Ã -dire qui passe par tous les points de pickup et de delivery, et que tous les pickups sont rÃ©alisÃ©s avant les deliveries associÃ©es.
      Parameters:
      matAdj - The optimal full sub-graph of the map as an adjacence matrix
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      ptsIdToIndex - The dictionnary associating and Intersection ID with its index in the adjacence matrix
      Returns:
      the path as a SuperAretes list, representing each the path between two consecutive interest points. Contract : the first index in matAdj represents the departure address.

    • tourneeTriviale

      private static Tournee tourneeTriviale​(Map map, PlanningRequest planning, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> intersecIdToIndex)
      Computes a Tour in the fastest possible way, by iteratively going from a request's pickup to its delivery, then to the next request's pickup, for each Request.
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      intersecIdToIndex - The dictionnary giving the index of an Intersection in the Intersection list of the map, from its ID
      Returns:
      the computed Tour

    • greedy

      private static Tournee greedy​(SuperArete[][] matAdj, PlanningRequest planning, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> intersecIdToIndex)
      Computes a Tour using a greedy algorithm, heading at each iteration to the closest remaining interest point to the current position.
      Parameters:
      matAdj - The optimal full sub-graph of the map as an adjacence matrix
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      intersecIdToIndex - The dictionnary giving the index of an Intersection in the Intersection list of the map, from its ID
      Returns:
      the computed Tour

      private static Tournee tourneeRandom​(Map map, PlanningRequest planning, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> intersecIdToIndex)
      Generates a random Tour that respects the pickup -> delivery order constraints, with the Requests and the Map given as parameters FIXME apparemment passe pas par tous les points nÃ©cessaires
      Parameters:
      map - The map representing the graph on which we search

      Returns:
      the computed Tour

    • branchAndBoundOpti

      private static Tournee branchAndBoundOpti​(SuperArete[][] matAdj, PlanningRequest planning)
      Computes a Tour using the Branch and Bound paradigm. The computed tour is optimal : its path is the shortest possible. Execution time may as such be longer than the other heuristics.
      Parameters:
      matAdj - The optimal full sub-graph of the map as an adjacence matrix
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      Returns:
      the computed Tour

    • branchAndBoundExhaustif

      private static Tournee branchAndBoundExhaustif​(SuperArete[][] matAdj, PlanningRequest planning)
      Computes a Tour using the Branch and Bound paradigm. The computed tour is optimal : its path is the shortest possible. Execution time may as such be longer than the other heuristics. Uses a worse heuristic than the function above, making it a near-exhaustive search.
      Parameters:
      matAdj - The optimal full sub-graph of the map as an adjacence matrix
      planning - The planning that includes a list of requests to deal with as well as the departure address
      Returns:
      the computed Tour
